info.title: Superfluid Data API
info.description: API for accessing aggregated data about Superfluid Super Tokens, including statistics, price history, and CoinGecko mappings. Data is updated periodically by background automation jobs.

isListed.description: Whether token is listed on official Superfluid token list

isNativeAssetSuperToken.description: Whether this is a native asset Super Token

isPureSuperToken.description: Whether this is a Pure Super Token (no underlying asset, zero address)

isWrapperSuperToken.description: Whether this is a Wrapper Super Token (wraps another ERC20 token)

underlyingAddress.description: Address of underlying token, null for native asset Super Tokens

lastUpdated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last data update

SuperToken.description: A Superfluid Super Token with statistics and metadata
SuperToken.title: SuperToken

get.description: Retrieves the current price for a specific Super Token. Uses CoinGecko API for tokens with CoinGecko IDs, or GeckoTerminal on-chain API for others.
